# The Wizard Tearoom Website Migration Project

This project successfully migrates The Wizard Tearoom WordPress website to GitHub Pages with enhanced design and functionality.

## Project Overview
- **Source**: WordPress site at https://thewizardtearoom.co.uk/
- **Target**: Modern static website for GitHub Pages
- **Business**: Country tearoom requiring image-rich, performant website
- **Status**: ✅ Migration Complete

## Key Features Implemented
- ✅ Enhanced UI with country tearoom aesthetic
- ✅ Responsive design for all devices
- ✅ Performance-optimized with lazy loading
- ✅ Complete content migration from WordPress
- ✅ Image-rich showcase design
- ✅ Contact information and space hire details
- ✅ Social media integration

## Architecture
- Static HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- Responsive grid layouts
- Optimized images from original site
- GitHub Pages ready deployment
- Modern CSS with custom properties
- Vanilla JavaScript for performance

## Development Setup
- Development server available at http://localhost:3000
- Live reload enabled for development
- All assets organized and optimized
